## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass">SimpleLoopUnswitchPass</a></>}>
This pass transforms loops that contain branches or switches on loop- invariant conditions to have multiple loops. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/shouldrunextrasimpleloopunswitch">ShouldRunExtraSimpleLoopUnswitch</a></>}>
A marker analysis to determine if SimpleLoopUnswitch should run again on a given loop. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/shouldrunextrasimpleloopunswitch/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h">llvm/IR/PassManager.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater">LPMUpdater</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass transforms loops that contain branches or switches on loop-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// invariant conditions to have multiple loops. For example, it turns the left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into the right code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  for (...)                  if (lic)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    A                          for (...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    if (lic)                     A; B; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      B                      else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    C                          for (...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                 A; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This can increase the size of the code exponentially (doubling it every time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a loop is unswitched) so we only unswitch if the resultant code will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// smaller than a threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass expects LICM to be run before it to hoist invariant conditions out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the loop, to make the unswitching opportunity obvious.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There is a taxonomy of unswitching that we use to classify different forms</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of this transformaiton:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Trival unswitching: this is when the condition can be unswitched without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   cloning any code from inside the loop. A non-trivial unswitch requires</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   code duplication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Full unswitching: this is when the branch or switch is completely moved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   from inside the loop to outside the loop. Partial unswitching removes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   branch from the clone of the loop but must leave a (somewhat simplified)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   branch in the original loop. While theoretically partial unswitching can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   be done for switches, the requirements are extreme - we need the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   invariant input to the switch to be sufficient to collapse to a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   successor in each clone.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass always does trivial, full unswitching for both branches and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// switches. For branches, it also always does trivial, partial unswitching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If enabled (via the constructor&#39;s &#96;NonTrivial&#96; parameter), this pass will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// additionally do non-trivial, full unswitching for branches and switches, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will do non-trivial, partial unswitching for branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Because partial unswitching of switches is extremely unlikely to be possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in practice and significantly complicates the implementation, this pass does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not currently implement that in any mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass/#a0ed6976cf8c41b6edc04bdc7514ab34c">SimpleLoopUnswitchPass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;SimpleLoopUnswitchPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NonTrivial;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Trivial;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass/#a0ed6976cf8c41b6edc04bdc7514ab34c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass/#a0ed6976cf8c41b6edc04bdc7514ab34c">SimpleLoopUnswitchPass</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NonTrivial = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Trivial = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : NonTrivial(NonTrivial), Trivial(Trivial) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass/#ae7088b7b5c8bd069497f13e3e1990eff">run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58dde534a0ea2a23cb6c779c5c283f75">LoopAnalysisManager</a> &amp;AM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstandardanalysisresults">LoopStandardAnalysisResults</a> &amp;AR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater">LPMUpdater</a> &amp;U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simpleloopunswitchpass/#a200a7ffd107aee97365d96726a222fc0">printPipeline</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>)&gt; MapClassName2PassName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"></CodeLine>
